name: Triangle Wrangle
description:
My Entry for the Mini  Jam 98: Empty. The Game was created in 3 and it's really bad, so don't expect mutch. I over scoped a bit, but I had really fun making it! Some Ideas are from the game triangle-game.

Theme Interpritation: "Empty Inventory".

Notice: The WebGL build could have some bugs that I'm not aware of, so it would be better to play the downloaded version.

In Triangle Wrangle you try to survive in a dungeon and you shoot some triangles on the way!

Controls: Controls:W A S D- MovementMouse 1- Shooting (if you have any weapons)Mouse 2- DashQ- Switch weapon (if you have any weapons)

Tipps:

  1. Dash trough crates for health
  2. Dashing deals damage
